response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and significance. Given its importance to me, I am willing to consider a fair offer that respects its true worth. Considering its value to you, which you estimate at $800,000, I propose a price of $950,000. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, providing you with access to this valuable asset while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
